purpose: Validate that the Governance Dependency & Execution Constraint Manifest (GDECM) reflects the latest, ACPE-validated policy and model configurations prior to the S0 GSEP-C trigger.

validation_targets.assertion: The runtime GDECM schema must cryptographically match the PCSIM canonical hash.
Every mandate within PVLM must have a corresponding, non-contradictory stage dependency defined within the GDECM.
GDECM model pointers (e.g., S5/S6.7 references) must correlate to the current CRoT-certified model version and pass MPAM integrity checks.
